moves.1. e4: My first mini-tournament. Classic king pawn. Nothing here yet.
moves.2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Nc3: He still hasn't moved d4, but I don't care.
moves.3... Nc6: You have two knights, I have two knights.
moves.4. Bc4: I didn't know if this was a threaten on f7, so I decide to play with it.
moves.4... e5 5. O-O: Kingside castle. Now here comes the fun!
moves.6... Bd6: geting ready for a Bxh2+. Also I'm luring the knight away to f7 so I can...
moves.8. Nxh8: Now that the knight's in the corner, and that I'm lined up with a bishop and a queen, the fun can begin.
moves.8... Bxh2+ 9. Kh1: Now he sees the danger! But it is to late.
moves.10. d3: He tries to get my queen away.
moves.12... Qh2#: Checkmate! And I have won my first mini-tournament game.
